track.name: Come Rain or Come Shine
comments: I don't which 2-generation team is better, them or Knofler & Atkins. Different styles, but who is better?
dos grande músicos y una excelente melodía!!!
Great team-up not that long ago!..God bless BB King..Gonna be 87 soon and he's still out there performing on tour for us!
He tarried there from errantry,and melodies they taught to him and sages old him marvels told,and harps of gold they brought to him
Oh BB,  sustain....... Man, Two the BEST..... I'm crying.....
Two of my favorite musicians ... very nice.
bb king didn't wanted to do this because ray charles' version was too awesome for him to dare to sing it. but eric told him he should sang it, and he finally did.
B. B.'s still got it!! Great to hear him teamed up with Eric!! The album may not have great cuts all throughout, but they are still a great duo!!
How beautiful can it get...aNGel sMILes~~~~~~~~~~~
